entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 4:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
